title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4403 - Formation Of Corporations
content:

§ 4403.1 - Condition of operation
§ 4403.2 - Plan of operation
§ 4403.3 - Organizational plan of the corporation
§ 4403.4 - Additional information
§ 4403.5 - Job security agreements for track employees

§ 4403.7 - Contracts for audio-visual broadcasts
§ 4403.8 - Board of directors and officers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4403

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128, 906; L. 1940, ch. 254, §
118, as amd. by L. 1973, ch. 346, § 4; L. 1973, ch. 414, §
5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
